xwikidoc.content:
= Macros Admin =
[[Click to Import all Panels as XWiki Wiki Macros>>MacrosAdmin.XWikiPanelsImport]] - all macros will be created in Macros2 space (just for tesing, it should be Macros in the final version). Only first import will be successful, following attempts will fail (use Delete Space Snippet bellow before, if you would like to repeat the import).
[[Delete Space Snippet>>MacrosAdmin.DeleteSpaceSnippet]] - You can go here and delete Macros2 Space after importing all Panels as macros there, in order to repeat the action.
